page.title: 14INTERVIEW
page.content: My Mum came to England from India in 1966. When she first arrived she lived in Kent before moving to Feltham. When she first arrived there was very little unemployment.Not many people owned their own television instead they rented them,also no one had a video recorder or had even heard of them. Central heating was very much of a luxury as many people stii had coal fires. Violence on the television and in the football grounds was far less frequent and also many more people went to the cinema. Today many of the cinemas have closed down and become bingo-halls. My Mam also told me that when she first arrived far more women stayed at home to look after the house whereas today they are more independant and many have a career.
